channel.title: Help with changing something
channel.description:
hey when i ban someone it says
youve been banned by _______. please visit fourms at ______________ to apeal.
anyone no how to change fourms so i can put mine on it
Also where do i change the welcome message. i found it before but forgot=P

item.title: Help with changing something
item.dc:creator: @Telenim Telenim
item.description:
@Telenim wrote:

[quote=“Telenim, post:2, topic:301476”]Search for your ban command by opening the client.java file and hitting CTRL+F, type “ban” or “banuser”, and you will see a few lines that say

sendMessage("You've been banned by Jaydog0420.") sendMessage("Please visit forums at forumsURL to appeal.")
Anything in between the two "'s on the one line is edit-able, if you’re using a DeltaScape base then it would most likely be

sendMessage("You've been banned by Jaydog0420.") sendMessage("Please visit forums at forumsURL to appeal.")[/quote]I’m sorry, I forgot to change the second sendMessage lines to sM! :mad:

Read full topic

item.title: Help with changing something
item.dc:creator: @Telenim Telenim
item.description:
@Telenim wrote:

Search for your ban command by opening the client.java file and hitting CTRL+F, type “ban” or “banuser”, and you will see a few lines that say

sendMessage("You've been banned by Jaydog0420.") sendMessage("Please visit forums at forumsURL to appeal.")
Anything in between the two "'s on the one line is edit-able, if you’re using a DeltaScape base then it would most likely be

sM("You've been banned by Jaydog0420.") sM("Please visit forums at forumsURL to appeal.")

The entire ban command might(but won’t) look like this

if(command.equalsIgnoreCase("Ban") && (playerRights >= 2) { String victim = command.substring(8); PlayerHandler.kickNick = victim; System.out.println("Admin:"+playerName+" is banning "+victim); sendMessage("Player successfully banned."); appendToBanned(victim); BufferedWriter bw = null; try { bw = new BufferedWriter(new FileWriter("data/banlogs.txt", true)); bw.write(playerName+" banned"+victim); bw.newLine(); bw.flush(); }
(No, I’m not saying you should use that or it should look like that)

Read full topic
